item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 15, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

25. Using a graphics tablet as a programming tool (2018) (5 points | discuss)
26. New York Times shut down Tor Onion service (207 points | 125 comments)
27. Rembrandt to Picasso: Five ways to spot a fake masterpiece (21 points | 14 comments)
28. It doesn't cost much to improve someone's life (110 points | 109 comments)
29. An Egyptian Temple Reborn (19 points | discuss)
